$comment: This schema is used to define dragon variants within breed JSON files. Variants are visual or behavioral variations of a dragon breed that can be selected during spawning or breeding.
title: Dragon Variant Schema
description: Schema for defining dragon variants with their visual appearance and properties

id.description: Unique identifier for the variant. Used to reference this variant in code and other configurations.

texture.description: Main skin texture for the variant. This is the primary texture used for the dragon's body.

saddle_texture.description: Texture used for the saddle when the dragon is equipped with one. This is overlaid on top of the main texture.

glow_texture.description: Texture used for parts of the dragon that should glow in the dark. This is rendered with emissive properties.

egg_texture.description: Texture used for this variant's dragon egg. Each variant can have a unique egg appearance.

breath_type.description: The type of breath attack that this variant uses. Can override the breed's default breath type.

primary_color.description: Primary color of the variant in hexadecimal format (without # prefix). Used for the main body color and various rendering effects.

secondary_color.description: Secondary color of the variant in hexadecimal format (without # prefix). Used for highlights, patterns, and various rendering effects.

size_modifier.description: Size multiplier applied to the variant's base dimensions. Values greater than 1.0 make the variant larger, while values less than 1.0 make it smaller.
